DataElement.preferredName: Disease Response Evaluation Period Assessment Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the participant was assessed for disease status or response to treatment during the period.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may refer to eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression._The period of time during which an evaluation was performed._Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In medicine, an improvement related to treatment.

Concepts.definition: The pathologic and/or clinical changes that result from treatment. The changes may include eradication of detectable disease, stabilization of disease, or disease progression.

Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which an evaluation was performed.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which an evaluation was performed.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCISTD: NCI CRF Harmonization and Standards Initiative
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.   7/24/13 mc Created for R5 CRF harmonization effort.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk
